com.batataproductions.game.controller.entities

Class EntityBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.batataproductions.game.controller.entities.EntityBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigZombieBody, BulletBody, MediumZombieBody, PlayerBody, SmallZombieBody

    public abstract class EntityBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class that represents an abstract physical body supported by a Box2D body.

                               float forceY,
                               boolean awake)
        Wraps the applyForceToCenter method from the Box2D body class.
        Parameters:
        forceX - the x-component of the force to be applied
        forceY - the y-component of the force to be applied
        awake - should the body be awaken

      • applyLinearImpulseToCenter

        public void applyLinearImpulseToCenter(float impulseX,
                                       float impulseY,
                                       boolean awake)
        Wraps the applyLinearImpulse method from the Box2D body class. Applies the impulse in the body center.
        Parameters:
        impulseX - the x-component of the impulse to be applied
        impulseY - the y-component of the impulse to be applied
        awake - should the body be awaken
